text:
Customer Information:
    Name: Jane Wilson
    Email: jane.wilson@example.org
    Company: TechSolutions Inc.
    
    Product: ARP Guard Pro
    License: EF-12345-67890
    Version: 0.6.0
    
    Issue Details:
    The system is reporting false positives when detecting ARP attacks from IP address 192.168.1.45.
    This has been happening since Tuesday, June 15th.
    
    Network Configuration:
    - Router Model: Cisco RV340
    - Network Size: 120 devices
    - Firewall: Enabled
    - IPS Mode: Active
    
    Error Code: ERR-5523
